scripts.dev: concurrently --names "api-engine,client" -c "cyan,green" "pnpm --prefix api-engine run dev" "pnpm --prefix client run dev"
scripts.build: concurrently --names "api-engine,client" -c "cyan,green" "pnpm --prefix api-engine run build:release" "pnpm --prefix client run build"
scripts.start: concurrently --names "api-engine,client" -c "cyan,green" "pnpm --prefix api-engine run start:prod" "pnpm --prefix client run start"
